siteMetadata.title: Youtube 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Youtube 上的全球热门视频

blogPost.excerpt:
I got the chance to interview Bill Gates so I asked him: Will Covid-19 be the last pandemic? How does he deal with misinformation and conspiracy theories? And what is the next disaster? The Foundation Letter is here: https://ve42.co/BG21

Special thanks to Patreon supporters:
Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, Robert, fanime96, Marc Forand, Juan Benet, Robert Blum, Grace O'Maille KRON x Arc iOS, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex , Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal

Thanks to Petr Lebedev for early edits and Jonny Hyman for feedback
blogPost.body:
I got the chance to interview Bill Gates so I asked him: Will Covid-19 be the last pandemic? How does he deal with misinformation and conspiracy theories? And what is the next disaster? The Foundation Letter is here: https://ve42.co/BG21

Special thanks to Patreon supporters:
Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, Robert, fanime96, Marc Forand, Juan Benet, Robert Blum, Grace O'Maille KRON x Arc iOS, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex , Michael Krugman, Cy 'kkm' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal

Thanks to Petr Lebedev for early edits and Jonny Hyman for feedback
blogPost.title: I Asked Bill Gates What's The Next Crisis?
blogPost.author: Veritasium

localize.title: 我问比尔-盖茨下一个危机是什么？
localize.description:
我有机会采访比尔-盖茨，所以我问他。Covid -19会是最后一次大流行吗？他是如何处理错误信息和阴谋论的？下一场灾难又是什么？基金会的信在这里：https://ve42.co/BG21

特别感谢Patreon的支持者。
Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, Robert, fanime96, Marc Forand, Juan Benet, Robert Blum, Grace O'Maille KRON x Arc iOS, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex , Michael Krugman, Cy 'km' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal.

感谢Petr Lebedev的早期编辑和Jonny Hyman的反馈。

localize.title: 我問比爾-蓋茨下一個危機是什麼？
localize.description:
我有機會採訪比爾-蓋茨，所以我問他。Covid -19會是最後一次大流行嗎？他是如何處理錯誤信息和陰謀論的？下一場災難又是什麼？基金會的信在這裏：https://ve42.co/BG21

特別感謝Patreon的支持者。
Ludovic Robillard, jim buckmaster, Robert, fanime96, Marc Forand, Juan Benet, Robert Blum, Grace O'Maille KRON x Arc iOS, Richard Sundvall, Lee Redden, Vincent, Lyvann Ferrusca, Alfred Wallace, Arjun Chakroborty, Joar Wandborg, Clayton Greenwell, Pindex , Michael Krugman, Cy 'km' K'Nelson, Sam Lutfi, Ron Neal.

感謝Petr Lebedev的早期編輯和Jonny Hyman的反饋。

previous.excerpt:
Dustin Poirier is the #1 ranked UFC lightweight fresh off his win against Conor McGregor at UFC 257. He does amazing work with his foundation, The Good Fight, and appropriately enough he also has a hot sauce—Poirier's Louisiana Style. But how is he with REALLY spicy food? Find out as "The Diamond" takes on one of his toughest opponents yet—the wings of death!—while discussing Cajun food, crazy amateur fighting stories, and YouTuber boxing matches.

localize.title: 达斯汀-波里耶在吃辣翅的时候得到了全额的报酬｜辣妹子
localize.description:
达斯汀-波里耶是UFC轻量级排名第一的选手，刚刚在UFC257中战胜了康纳-麦格雷戈。他与他的基金会一起做了惊人的工作，好的战斗，适当地，他也有一个辣酱-Poirier的路易斯安那风格。但他是如何与真正的辛辣食物？当 "钻石 "对他最难对付的对手之一--死亡之翼时，你就会发现，他在讨论Cajun食物、疯狂的业余格斗故事和YouTuber拳击比赛的同时，也在寻找答案。

localize.title: 達斯汀-波里耶在喫辣翅的時候得到了全額的報酬｜辣妹子
